tail.name: tail
tail.transformationDescription:
#IF(npc.getTailCount()==1) A furry, sergal-like tail sprouts from just above [npc.her] ass, rapidly growing in size until it's about [npc.tailLength] long. [npc.She] quickly [npc.verb(realise)] that [npc.she] [npc.has] limited control over it, but [npc.is] still able to swish it from side to side.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] a [style.boldSergalSlate(sergal tail)], [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.tailFullDescription(true)]. #ELSE [npc.TailCount] furry, sergal-like tails sprout from just above [npc.her] ass, rapidly growing in size until they're each about [npc.tailLength] long. [npc.She] quickly [npc.verb(realise)] that [npc.she] [npc.has] limited control over them, but [npc.is] still able to swish them from side to side.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] [npc.tailCount] [style.boldSergalSlate(sergal tails)], [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.tailFullDescription(true)]. #ENDIF
tail.bodyDescription: Growing out from just above [npc.her] ass, [npc.sheHasFull] #IF(npc.getTailCount()==1) a #IF(npc.isTailFeral()) [style.colourFeral(feral)],#ENDIF [npc.tailColour(true)] sergal tail, which [npc.she] can swish from side to side at will. #ELSE [npc.tailCount] #IF(npc.isTailFeral()) [style.colourFeral(feral)],#ENDIF [npc.tailColour(true)] sergal tails, which [npc.she] can swish from side to side at will. #ENDIF
